ygData.subject: Out gunned
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I thought wizards were supposed to be masters of DD spells. I was with a level 29 cleric recently, and he has a spell (wrath) which was doing 198
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

I thought wizards were supposed to be masters of DD spells. I was with a
level 29 cleric recently, and he has a spell (wrath) which was doing 198
damage to my 178. Granted, I am level 27, but was still kind of shocked. It
was only a two level difference, and he had a better DD spell, and could
melee too. And buff. And heal. I know at 29 I will get Inferno Shock, but
this just makes my think that we should be doing more damage, or have faster
mana regen, or SOMETHING. Just another example of how Verant has made the
wizard class suck.

Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)
